title: $:/plugins/benwebber/css-palette
name: css-palette
description: Expose TiddlyWiki palette colours as CSS variables
author: Ben Webber
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/benwebber/css-palette/README":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/css-palette/README","text":"''css-palette'' exposes [[TiddlyWiki palette|https://tiddlywiki.com/#ColourPalettes]] colours as [[CSS variables|https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/Using_CSS_custom_properties]].

{{$:/plugins/benwebber/css-palette/macros/public}}
"},"$:/plugins/benwebber/css-palette/Settings":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/css-palette/Settings","text":"\define checkactions()
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/plugins/benwebber/css-palette/config/$(__key__)$" />
\end

\define boolean(key, text)
<$checkbox
  tiddler="$:/plugins/benwebber/css-palette/config/$key$"
  field="text"
  checked="true"
  unchecked="false"
  default={{$:/plugins/benwebber/css-palette/config/$key$}}
  checkactions=<<checkactions>>
>
$text$
</$checkbox>
\end

<<boolean RenderCurrentPalette "Automatically define variables for current palette">>
"},"$:/plugins/benwebber/css-palette/config/RenderCurrentPalette":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/css-palette/config/RenderCurrentPalette","text":"true"},"$:/plugins/benwebber/css-palette/public":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/css-palette/public","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define css-palette(palette: "{$:/palette}", prefix: "tc-")
\rules only macrocallinline html
:root {
<$list filter="[$palette$indexes[]sort[title]]" variable="name">
  --<<__prefix__>><<name>>: <$macrocall $name="colour" name=<<name>> />;
</$list>
}
\end

!! `css-palette`

Render CSS variables for all the colours defined in the given palette.

!!! Parameters

;palette
: A filter tiddler reference to the palette (e.g., `{$:/palette}` or `[$:/palettes/Vanilla]`).  The default is the current palette (`{$:/palette}`).

;prefix
: Prefix variable names with this prefix. The default matches ~TiddlyWiki classes (`tc-`).
"},"$:/plugins/benwebber/css-palette/styles":{"title":"$:/plugins/benwebber/css-palette/styles","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","list-before":"","text":"<$list filter="[[$:/plugins/benwebber/css-palette/config/RenderCurrentPalette]get[text]] +[match[true]]">
<<css-palette>>
</$list>
"}}}
